citeinfo.title: COUNTY_GOVERNMENT_BOUNDARIES_IDHS_IN: Governmental Boundaries Maintained by County Agencies in Indiana (Indiana Department of Homeland Security, Polygon feature class)
citeinfo.othercit: This data set was provided to personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) by Indiana Department of Homeland Security (IDHS) personnel. The data set provided was in an ESRI Geodatabase feature class format, and was named "County_Govt_Boundary." This data represents a preliminary (partial) set of data harvested through the ongoing Data Sharing Initiative program by the Indiana Department of Homeland Security (IDHS) from local government sources in June 2009, and subsequently updated on September 30, 2009, December 2, 2009, December 28, 2009, February 2, 2010, March 5, 2010, April 6, 2010, October 11, 2010, November 19, 2010, March 22, 2011, September 8, 2011, January 30, 2012, June 8, 2012, August 27, 2012, April 27, 2013, November 22, 2013, January 19, 2014, October 14, 2014, June 22, 2015, and December 17, 2015. As a preliminary data set, these data have not been completely quality control checked for completeness, accuracy or content and are provided for program demonstration purposes only. These preliminary data are provided "as-is" and are not to be used for any official or business purpose.

descript.abstract: COUNTY_GOVERNMENT_BOUNDARIES_IDHS_IN is an ESRI Geodatabase polygon feature class that contains governmental boundaries maintained by county agencies in Indiana, provided by personnel of Indiana Department of Homeland Security (IDHS) as of June 29, 2009, and subsequently updated on September 30, 2009, December 2, 2009, December 28, 2009, February 2, 2010, March 5, 2010, April 6, 2010, October 11, 2010, November 19, 2010, March 22, 2011, September 8, 2011, January 30, 2012, June 8, 2012, August 27, 2012, April 27, 2013, November 22, 2013, January 19, 2014, October 14, 2014, June 22, 2015, and December 17, 2015. This data set was provided by IDHS in ESRI feature class format and was named "County_Govt_Boundary." This data set was compiled by IDHS as part of the IndianaMap Data Sharing Initiative between IGIC, Indiana Office of Technology (IOT), Indiana Geographic Information Office (GIO), Indiana Department of Homeland Security (IDHS), Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) and participating Indiana counties to provide the most accurate framework data (including address points, street centerlines, land parcels, and governmental boundaries) for the citizens of Indiana. More information is available at the following Web URL: http://www.igic.org/news/index.php?itemid=265
descript.purpose: This data set was developed to provide accurate framework data (including address points, street centerlines, land parcels, and governmental boundaries)for Indiana, as part of the IndianaMap Data Sharing Initiative.

timeperd.current: Based on the publication date (harvest date) for the TWENTIETH update for the source feature class "County_Govt_Boundary."

idinfo.native: ESRI ArcGIS version 10.3 file geodatabase format, approximately 13.6 Mb Microsoft Windows 7 Enterprise, ESRI ArcCatalog 10.3

attracc.attraccr: This preliminary data set was provided "as-is" and is not assumed to be accurate.

dataqual.logic: This preliminary data set was provided by IGIC personnel and is assumed to be accurate.
dataqual.complete: This preliminary data set was provided "as-is" and is not assumed to be complete for all participating Indiana counties.

horizpa.horizpar: This preliminary data set was provided "as-is" and is not assumed to be accurate.

citeinfo.title: County_Govt_Boundary (Polygon feature class)
citeinfo.othercit: This data set was provided to IGS personnel from IDHS personnel (Roger Koelpin) on June 29,2009, and subsequently updated on September 30, 2009, December 2, 2009, December 28, 2009, February 2, 2010, March 5, 201, April 6, 2010, October 11, 2010, November 19, 2010, March 22, 2011, September 8, 2011, January 30, 2012, June 8, 2012, August 27, 2012, April 27, 2013, November 22, 2013, January 19, 2014, October 14, 2014, June 22, 2015, and December 17, 2015 as part of the IndianaMap Data Sharing Initiative. The IndianaMap Data Sharing Initiative between IDHS, Indiana Office of Technology (IOT), Indiana Geographic Information Office (GIO), Indiana Geographic Information Council (IGIS), Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) and participating Indiana counties to provide the most accurate framework data (including address points, street centerlines, land parcels, and governmental boundaries) for th citizens of Indiana.

srctime.srccurr: Based on the attribute value named "LOADDATE" found in the source feature class named "County_Govt_Boundary"

srcinfo.srccontr: Governmental boundaries for participating Indiana counties

procstep.procdesc: IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" from IDHS personnel (Roger KoelPin) on June 29, 2009. "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" was loaded into ESRI ArcMap 9.3.1 and the data were examined for completeness. The shapefile was then renamed to COUNTY_GOVERNMENT_BOUNDARIES_IGIC_IN.SHP to conform to IGS naming conventions.

IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" from IGIC personnel (Phill Worrall) on September 30, 2009. The following fields were deleted from the attribute table; "Source_Fea," "Data_Secur," "Distributi," "GNIS_ID," "Areasqkm," "Fcode," "Designatio," "State_Fips," "Admintype," "Ownerorman," and "Current_St." "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" was loaded into ESRI ArcMap 9.3.1 and the data were examined for completeness. The shapefile was then renamed to COUNTY_GOVERNMENT_BOUNDARIES_IGIC_IN.SHP to conform to IGS naming conventions.

IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" from IGIC personnel (Phill Worrall) on December 2, 2009. The following fields were deleted from the attribute table; "Permanent_Identifier," "Source_FeatureID," "Data_Security," "Distribution_Policy," "GNIS_ID," "Areasqkm," "Fcode," "Designation," "State_FipsCode," "Admintype," "OwnerorManagingAgency," and "Current_Status." "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" was loaded into ESRI ArcMap 9.3.1 and the data were examined for completeness. The shapefile was then renamed to COUNTY_GOVERNMENT_BOUNDARIES_IGIC_IN.SHP to conform to IGS naming conventions.

IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" from IGIC personnel (Phill Worrall) on December 28, 2009. The following fields were deleted from the attribute table; "Permanent_Identifier," "Source_FeatureID," "Data_Security," "Distribution_Policy," "GNIS_ID," "Areasqkm," "Designation," "State_FipsCode," "Admintype," "OwnerorManagingAgency," and "Current_Status." "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" was loaded into ESRI ArcMap 9.3.1 and the data were examined for completeness. The shapefile was then renamed to COUNTY_GOVERNMENT_BOUNDARIES_IGIC_IN.SHP to conform to IGS naming conventions.

IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" from IGIC personnel (Phill Worrall) on February 2, 2010. The following fields were deleted from the attribute table; "Permanent_Identifier," "Source_FeatureID," "Data_Security," "Distribution_Policy," "GNIS_ID," "Areasqkm," "Designation," "State_FipsCode," "Admintype," "OwnerorManagingAgency," and "Current_Status." "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" was loaded into ESRI ArcMap 9.3.1 and the data were examined for completeness. The shapefile was then renamed to COUNTY_GOVERNMENT_BOUNDARIES_IGIC_IN.SHP to conform to IGS naming conventions.

IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" from IGIC personnel (Phill Worrall) on March 5, 2010. The following fields were deleted from the attribute table; "Permanent_Identifier," "Source_FeatureID," "Data_Security," "Distribution_Policy," "GNIS_ID," "Areasqkm," "Designation," "State_FipsCode," "Admintype," "OwnerorManagingAgency," and "Current_Status." "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" was loaded into ESRI ArcMap 9.3.1 and the data were examined for completeness. The shapefile was then renamed to COUNTY_GOVERNMENT_BOUNDARIES_IGIC_IN.SHP to conform to IGS naming conventions. (NOTE: Data previously provided by LaPorte and Montgomery Counties are not present in this update. New data for Dearborn and Greene Counties have been added).

IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" from IGIC personnel (Phill Worrall) on April 6, 2010. The following fields were deleted from the attribute table; "Permanent_Identifier," "Source_FeatureID," "Data_Security," "Distribution_Policy," "GNIS_ID," "Areasqkm," "Designation," "State_FipsCode," "Admintype," "OwnerorManagingAgency," and "Current_Status." "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" was loaded into ESRI ArcMap 9.3.1 and the data were examined for completeness. The shapefile was then renamed to COUNTY_GOVERNMENT_BOUNDARIES_IGIC_IN.SHP to conform to IGS naming conventions.

IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" from IGIC personnel (Phill Worrall) on October 11, 2010. The following fields were deleted from the attribute table; "Permanent_Identifier," "Source_FeatureID," and "Current_Status." "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" was loaded into ESRI ArcMap 10 and the data were examined for completeness. The shapefile was then renamed to COUNTY_GOVERNMENT_BOUNDARIES_IGIC_IN.SHP to conform to IGS naming conventions.

IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" from IGIC personnel (Phill Worrall) on November 19, 2010. The following fields were deleted from the attribute table; "Permanent_Identifier," "Source_FeatureID," and "Current_Status." "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" was loaded into ESRI ArcMap 10 and the data were examined for completeness. The shapefile was then renamed to COUNTY_GOVERNMENT_BOUNDARIES_IGIC_IN.SHP to conform to IGS naming conventions.

IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Govt_Boundary.shp" from IGIC personnel (Phill Worrall) on March 22, 2011. The following fields were deleted from the attribute table; "Permanent_Identifier," "Source_FeatureID," and "Current_Status." The shapefile was then exported to an ESRI file geodatabase named COUNTY_GOVERNMENT_BOUNDARIES_IGIC_IN.GDB to conform to IGS naming conventions.

This metadata file was pre-parsed and parsed using CNS (Chew and Spit, v. 2.6.1) and MP (Metadata Parser, v. 2.7.1) software written by Peter N. Schweitzer (U.S. Geological Survey). The errors generated by MP were all addressed and corrected, except that no values were assigned to "Abscissa_Resolution" and "Ordinate_Resolution."

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated

attr.attrdef: Unique WFS ID number captured during the IDHS harvesting process
Source origin of subset of data, originating Indiana county
Date that the IDHS harvested the County-supplied data subset
Identification code for the county where the the street address is located
Length of the perimeter of the governmental boundary

distinfo.distliab:
CREDIT
It is requested, but not required, that the IndianaMap Data Sharing Initiative between IGIC, Indiana Office of Technology (IOT), Indiana Geographic Information Office (GIO), Indiana Department of Homeland Security (IDHS), Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) and participating Indiana counties be cited in any products generated from this data set. If citing, the following source citation language should be included: [COUNTY_GOVERNMENT_BOUNDARIES_IDHS_IN: Governmental Boundaries Maintained by County Agencies in Indiana, Twentieth Harvest (Indiana Department of Homeland Security, Polygon feature class), 20151217].
WARRANTY
Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey warrants that the media on which this product is stored will be free from defect in materials and workmanship for ninety (90) days from the date of acquisition. If such a defect is found, return the media to Publication Sales, Indiana Geological Survey, 611 North Walnut Grove, Bloomington, Indiana 47405-2208, and it will be replaced free of charge.
LIMITATION OF WARRANTIES AND LIABILITY
Except for the expressed warranty above, the product is provided "AS IS", without any other warranties or conditions, expressed or implied, including, but not limited to, warranties for product quality, or suitability to a particular purpose or use. The risk or liability resulting from the use of this product is assumed by the user. Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey shares no liability with product users indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages whatsoever, including, but not limited to, loss of revenue or profit, lost or damaged data or other commercial or economic loss. Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey is not responsible for claims by a third party. The maximum aggregate liability to the original purchaser shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the product.

metainfo.metuc: This metadata file is intended to accompany the data set identified and received from the IGS. It should not to be altered or summarized. IGS does not support secondary distribution. If this data set was received from anyone besides the IGS, this metadata file and the data set it describes may lack integrity.
